category on a.cat = category.id left join region parent on a.parent = parent.id left join regionlevel "level" on a."level" = "level".id left join art art on a.art = art.id left join lily."user" ownerUser on a.uid = ownerUser.id left join art material on a.material = material.id left join lily."group" ownerGroup on a.gid = ownerGroup.id left join art for_art on a.for_art = for_art.id

mapper.insert: insert into region( code, uid, gid, mode, acl, label, description, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", props, "path", proto, parent, "depth", height, "level", cat, tag, x, y, z, dx, dy, dz, material, for_cat, for_art, art ) values( #{code}, #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{label}, #{description}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{version}, #{properties.jsonStr}::jsonb, #{path}, #{protoId}, #{parentId}, #{depth}, #{height}, #{levelId}, #{categoryId}, #{tagId}, #{position.dx}, #{position.dy}, #{position.dz}, #{bbox.dx}, #{bbox.dy}, #{bbox.dz}, #{materialId}, #{forCatId}, #{forArtId}, #{artifactId} );
